details.email: General enquiries: beasb@online.tm; Consular enquiries: consular.ashgabat@fco.gov.uk; Visa enquiries: https://ukvi-international.faq-help.com/
details.description: If you are having difficulty with the main telephone number for the Embassy, please try any of the following: +993 12 363463, 363464, 363466, 363498 or 363474; or +99365 7102033; or call the FCO Switchboard in London on +44 (0)20 7008 1500 for assistance.
details.access_and_opening_times:
Our Opening Hours

Monday to Thursday 08.30-17.00 Friday 08.30-15.30 Lunch 12.30-13.30

BRITISH EMBASSY ASHGABAT – LOCAL HOLIDAYS 2015

Thursday, 1 January - New Year’s Day

Thursday, 19 February - National Flag Day

Friday, 20 March - In lieu of Novruz Bayram

Friday, 3 April - Good Friday

Monday, 6 April - Easter Monday

Monday, 4 May - May bank holiday

Monday, 25 May - Spring Bank Holiday

Monday, 31 August - Summer Bank Holiday

TBC, September - Kurban Bayram

Tuesday, 6 October - Earthquake Memorial Day

Tuesday, 27 October - Independence Day

Friday, 11 December - In lieu of Neutrality Day

Friday, 25 December - Christmas Day

Monday, 28 December - Boxing Day
